modName: Richard Follower from gophers Lets play
summary: This is a very simple follower mod with the basic voices based loosley (due to my modding capabilities) on the Richard character from gophers lets play Skyrim again video series. Can be found in the Sleeping Giant inn in riverwood with some basic gear.
descriptionHtml:
This is a very simple follower mod with the basic voices based loosely (due to my modding capabilities) on the Richard character from gophers lets play Skyrim again video series. Can be found in the Sleeping Giant inn in Riverwood with some basic gear. armor in the picture is not his actual gear.
 He specializes in archery and light armor with block and one handed as secondary skills.

And for those of you asking questions in the comments, i\'m sorry i havn\'t been answering them but my internet is making it take over 2 hours to post a reply, no joke :(
author: totalcookie4
